title: downloading file from FTP with urllib2.urlopen is too slow
body:
I'm trying to download files from FTP using this code:

    with closing(urllib2.urlopen(file_url)) as r:
        with open(dir + '/' + filename, 'wb') as f:
            shutil.copyfileobj(r, f)

I took about 30 secs for a 900KB file! what should I do?
